review: DO NOT BUY! The fire stick has a lot of problems.  It is always buffering during a game or show.  My wife and I like to watch baseball on ESPN.  The Fire Stick would always freeze when the game got exciting.  I would have to reboot it and miss part of the game. If you are watching a long game, the device gets hot and will shut down.  I went to Best Buy and purchased the Fire TV.  Hooked it up in place of the Fire Stick and have not had any of the problems I had with the stick.
